description:
The Special Ritual Riot Squad is a military force belonging to the http://anidb.net/ch95155 [Special Sword Administration Bureau] of the National Police Agency. They wield the special swords known as the http://anidb.net/t7101 [okatana] and have permission to use them at their own discretion. They hold a special position in government service, and a lot of them are females that haven`t yet reached adulthood.
Source: Toji no Miko Wiki
name: Tokubetsu Saishi Kidoutai
